title: Ep. 1108 - Alex Jones Forced To Pay Nearly $1 Billion In Heated Court Battle
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEl

The New York Times excuses Biden’s lies, a court forces Alex Jones to pay almost $1 billion for getting a story wrong on air, and Maryland’s largest county sees a 582% increase in “gender nonconforming” students.

- - - 

DailyWire+:

Candace Owens presents “The Greatest Lie Ever Sold”, streaming exclusively on DailyWire+: https://bit.ly/3SsC5se

Join the Jeremy’s Razors Contest For The Car at https://www.jeremysrazors.com/play. See terms and conditions for complete details at https://www.jeremysrazors.com/referralterms

 - - -
